title: Swivel - The Twisted Four-in-a-Row Game
description: The whole family will love this Twist on the Classic Four-in-a-Row Game™! It’s full of secret colors, sneaky moves and wacky wild tokens that make you Swivel It.  Just when you think you’re about to get four in a row, you or another player may have to twist a level of the 3D game board and change everything!
